SELECT rm.ID, rm.USERNAME, rm.EMAIL, rma.MOBILENUM, FROM_UNIXTIME(rm.ADDTIME) as ADDTIME, rm.ADDIP, rm.`STATUS`, rm.`TYPE`, rm.IS_FINANCIAL_USER, tmal.ID AS aid, tmal.USER_ID AS tuser_id, tmal.ISPASSED , tmal.ADDTIME auditTime, (SELECT rs.NAME FROM rocky_staff rs WHERE rs.ID = tmal.STAFF_ID) AS auditName FROM rocky_member rm LEFT JOIN t_member_audit_log tmal ON rm.ID = tmal.USER_ID LEFT JOIN rocky_mobile_appro rma ON rm.ID =rma.USER_ID WHERE rm.IS_FINANCIAL_USER = 0 AND (
(rm.STATUS = 0 AND tmal.ISPASSED = 1 AND tmal.id IS NOT NULL)
(rm.STATUS = -3 AND tmal.ISPASSED = -1 AND tmal.id IS NOT NULL)
(rm.STATUS = -2 AND tmal.id IS NULL)
(rm.STATUS = 0 AND tmal.ISPASSED = 1 AND tmal.id IS NOT NULL) or (rm.STATUS = -3 AND tmal.ISPASSED = -1 AND tmal.id IS NOT NULL) or (rm.STATUS = -2 AND tmal.id IS NULL)
)
and rm.USERNAME like concat('%',#{username},'%')
